name: Ruphel's Run-in with a Rambunctious Relic
name_original: Ruphel's Run-in with a Rambunctious Relic
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 42 whose theme was "Running out of Space!"

It's built using the Adventures Twine Format made by: https://twitter.com/Longwelwind 

Ruphel is a chinchilla who makes his living traveling from place to place selling various bits and bobbles. One day when moving through a desolate valley, he came upon a small trinket with the ability to duplicate anything it touched! What will he end up doing with this strange relic? It's up to you to decide!

Don't forget to rate this on the Ludum Dare website if you've played it!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/ruphels-run-in-with-a-rambunctious-relic
